c74object.name: jit.mo.join
c74object.digest: Combine jit.mo streams and output a multi-plane matrix
c74object.description: Combine jit.mo streams and output a multi-plane matrix. Automatically connects to jit.world to drive animations. Inputs add multiple jit.mo/matrix inputs for additive control.

objarg.name: Inlet Count
objarg.digest: Set the number of inlets and planecount of output
objarg.description: Set the number of inlets and planecount of output.

objarg.name: Dimension
objarg.digest: Set the dimension (number of elements) of the output matrix and any attached jit.mo.func objects
objarg.description: Set the dimension (number of elements) of the output matrix and any attached jit.mo.func objects. jit.mo objects only support matrices with a dimcount of 1.

attribute.name: interval
attribute.description: Animation interval (default = 0 ms). Using transport timing notation (4n,2n,etc.) connects animation timing to the Global Transport of Max.

attribute.name: speed
attribute.description: Animation speed (default = 1.). Scales animation speed of all connected jit.mo.func objects

attribute.name: enable
attribute.description: Enable Animation (default = 1). This affects any connected jit.mo.func objects
